definition: to succeed/to finish/to complete/to accomplish/to become/to turn into/to be all right/OK!/one tenth
lit. to practice austerities to become a Daoist immortal/practice makes perfect
to fly on a crane and become immortal

sentences.english: It is said, under the clothing this medicine, can instantly ascend to heaven becomes an immortal.
sentences.chinese: 据说，服下此药，能即刻升天成仙。

sentences.english: Since all people possess Dao-nature, they can achieve transcendence.
sentences.chinese: 也就是说，在人人皆有道性，都是有可能成仙的。

sentences.english: Through ascetic practices, people can become immortals , so they especially value the cultivation of long life.
sentences.chinese: 人通过修炼身体可以成仙，所以他们特别重视养生。

sentences.english: If she could be translated to Heaven tomorrow, she might be expected to ascend without any rapture.
sentences.chinese: 哪怕明天就能升天成仙，料想她也不会欣喜若狂。

sentences.english: But I've decided not to be a immortal any more.
sentences.chinese: 但是，我不打算再修炼成仙。

sentences.english: At that moment, I became an immortal.
Practices nei-tan work is taoists achieve immortality is the only way to attain.
sentences.chinese: 修练内丹功是道教徒达到成仙得道的唯一途径。

definition: to achieve the Dao/to become an immortal
to levitate heavenwards (a Daoist success)/to take off/to soar (of prices)
to levitate heavenwards (a Daoist success)/to take off/to soar (of prices)
Daoist immortal/supernatural entity/(in modern fiction) fairy, elf, leprechaun etc/fig. lighthearted person
to grow old with unfailing eyes and ears (idiom)
lit. to ascend to heaven/to die
to become a Buddha/to attain enlightenment
